parsing_result:
# Bracketing

Automatically vary settings over a series of pictures.

1. Press the **DRIVE/DELETE** button and select the desired bracketing option in the drive-mode menu.

   !Drive/Delete Button

2. Press the focus stick (focus lever) up or down to highlight one of the following:

   | Option             | Page |
   |--------------------|------|
   | ISO BKT            | 88   |
   | WHITE BALANCE BKT  | 88   |
   | BKT Bracketing     | 89   |

3. Press the focus stick left or right to highlight the desired bracketing settings.

4. Press **MENU/OK** to select.

5. Take pictures.
